entry.title: BIP49 Derivation scheme changes
entry.summary: In an email dated 05/09/17 09:10, Shiva Sitamraju via bitcoin-dev shared four keys related to segwit mainnet and testnet. The keys were 0x042393df, sxpr for segwit mainnet private key, 0x04239377, sxpb for segwit mainnet public key, 0x04222463, stpb for segwit testnet public key, and 0x042224cc, stpr for segwit testnet private key. Pavol Rusnak replied to the email stating that he is fine with both proposals from Shiva Sitamraju and Thomas regarding which proposal to use. Rusnak is the CTO of SatoshiLabs.
